title: Phase 3: Add help subcommand
description:
## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] Add `"help"` case to command dispatch
- [ ] `work help` → top-level help (stdout, exit 0)
- [ ] `work help <cmd>` → per-command help (stdout, exit 0)
- [ ] `work help <unknown>` → error (stderr, exit 1)
- [ ] Update shell completions to include `help`

## Context
Part of: Global --help Support for All Commands
Depends on: Phase 2
